name: TVDocumentViewControllerDelegate
desc: Methods to manage updates, events, and errors from the document view controller.

items.name: func documentViewControllerWillUpdate(TVDocumentViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the document will be updated.

items.name: func documentViewControllerDidUpdate(TVDocumentViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the document has been updated.

items.name: func documentViewController(TVDocumentViewController, didUpdateWithContext: [String : Any])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the document has been updated with a specified context.

items.name: func documentViewController(TVDocumentViewController, didFailUpdateWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the document failed to update.

items.name: func documentViewController(TVDocumentViewController, handleEvent: TVDocumentViewController.Event, with: TVViewElement) -> Bool
items.desc: Handles events natively from document view controllers.
